3748.name: Burlap Bowl by the Humblefactory
3748.description: This bowl is produced by the Humblefactory in the Madrona neighborhood of Seattle, Washington. It is an attempt at a hyperlocal product, in the same vein as meals made following a 100 mile diet. However, this product is meant to be made from locally sourced materials, using low-infrastructure manufacturing techniques, and minimal manufacturing energy.
